{"step_by_step_thinking": "Sickle cell anemia is caused by a mutation in the beta-globin chain of the hemoglobin. This mutation is a single nucleotide substitution, which is also known as a point mutation. This is clearly stated in multiple documents, such as Document [0], Document [1], Document [3], Document [16], Document [19], Document [20], and Document [24].
